title: Riot gifts (Party Icon)
body: I still havent got the surprise party icon. Is there still people that havent got it? I got riot Kayle can i get any help with this? Just annoyed

replies.body: Gifts are still being sent out, and you won't get it all at once.  Stay up to date with our current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  It will take some time, but you'll get the goods!

I still haven't gotten my icon but i got the gift but I really want the icon and its gonna suck if i don't get it. I just wanna address it so if i still don't get it I can assure I'll get it. Thank you! <3
